algorithm_technique: prefix sums and hash map for O(n) solution
problem_summary_simple: Find the maximum beauty of a garden by removing flowers, ensuring at least two flowers remain and the first and last have equal beauty.
problem_summary_technical: Uses prefix sums and a hash map to track first occurrences of flower beauties for O(n) max beauty calculation.
key_insights: The problem requires finding pairs of identical beauty flowers to form the ends of the garden.
Prefix sums efficiently calculate the sum of beauties between two indices.
A hash map stores the first occurrence of each beauty value to quickly find the start of a potential garden.
